short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay up to date with Buzz Break, the Chrome extension that makes it easy to access the latest news from around the world.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
❗By clicking “Add to Chrome”, I accept and agree to installing the Buzz Break extension and setting Chrome™ New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. 

✓ Permissions: Like most user-friendly extensions, Buzz Break requires standard permissions to deliver a seamless experience of news consumption.

ⓘ About
Buzz Break is a dynamic content delivery plugin and news aggregator that provides you with up-to-date information on events happening all over the world. It makes it easier for you to obtain up-to-date news, so you can stay informed without having to switch between several websites or apps.

With Buzz Break, you can enjoy a clutter-free, streamlined news consumption experience. It eliminates the need to sift through irrelevant content, bringing you only the news that matters most to you.

Features:

▪️ Provides quick access to the latest news from around the world
▪️ Delivers a clean, user-friendly interface for easy navigation
▪️ Saves time by bringing all your news in one place
▪️ Enhances your browsing experience by integrating seamlessly with Chrome
▪️ Features a clock above the search box
▪️ Displays current weather information for your location
▪️ Enables users to personalise their surroundings by simply clicking the wallpaper icon located at the bottom left corner of the screen
▪️ Buzz Break uses advanced algorithms to curate news from various sources, ensuring you always have the most relevant and up-to-date information. It doesn't modify any website content, maintaining the integrity of the information you receive.

Buzz Break is free to download and use, making global news accessible to everyone!

✓ Privacy

Your privacy is our priority. Any data processing happens on your computer, and we do not track or store your information.
